articles.author: Kate Bartlett
articles.title: South Africa reopens inquest into death of Steve Biko - NPR
articles.description: South Africa has reopened the investigation into the death of anti-apartheid leader Steve Biko — 48 years after he was killed in police custody.
articles.content: JOHANNESBURG, South Africa "September '77, Port Elizabeth weather fine. It was business as usual, in police room 619," go the opening lines of singer Peter Gabriel's famous anti-apartheid anthem from… [+3163 chars]
